entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
